sentences: „Ma viskan su vankrilt maha ...” – „Etse viska! Ptruu!” .. R. Sirge.
„Aga teistel on vara ja sellepärast tuleb vaenlane.” – „Etse tulgu! Kes käsib neil vara koguda." M. Metsanurk.
context: "Viskan" appears to be an interjection or adverbial expression used in Estonian, specifically from the examples showing "Etse viska!" and similar phrases. It seems to function as a command form or emphatic expression, possibly meaning something like "Go on!" or "Do it!" The word is connected with "etse" which appears to be an interjection encouraging action.
